roomsPage.title: Our Rooms
roomsPage.intro: Discover our selection of rooms and suites, each designed to reflect the charm of Marrakech with modern comfort.

double.title: Standard Double Room
double.desc: This spacious double room features air conditioning, a private entrance, and a private bathroom with a shower and hairdryer. The room offers soundproof walls, a wardrobe, tiled floors, heating, and a flat-screen TV. Includes 1 bed.

familySuite.title: Family Suite
familySuite.desc: In the well-equipped kitchen, guests will find a stove, refrigerator, kitchenware, and a tea/coffee kettle. The spacious family living room offers air conditioning, a private entrance, a garden-view terrace, and a private bathroom with a shower. The apartment has 3 beds.

juniorSuite.title: Junior Suite with Mountain View
juniorSuite.desc: Featuring a private entrance, this air-conditioned suite includes a living room, a separate bedroom, and a bathroom with a shower. Offering a garden-view terrace, it also has soundproof walls and a flat-screen TV. Includes 1 bed.

triplePool.title: Triple Room with Pool View
triplePool.desc: This spacious triple room offers air conditioning, a private entrance, a pool-view balcony, and a private bathroom with a shower. Includes 2 beds.
